full_description:
ORICO HVC-1080 HDMI to USB3.0 Video Capture Card

The ORICO HVC-1080 is an HDMI to USB3.0 Video Capture Card that supports HDMI 2.0 input and output HD 1080P. You can record and stream high-quality HDMI video up to 1080p at 60fps. Based on the high-speed USB 3.0 and HDMI 1.2 signal loop-out function, enjoy the joy of recording video and playing games live with low Latency. It is a great choice to use for Live Streaming, Recording, Video conferences, Mobile games live, and so on. The ORICO HVC-1080 HDMI to USB3.0 Video Capture Card has a 3.5mm microphone and audio input, allowing you to add your own commentary to the live streaming and video recording in time. It offers wide compatibility. It comes with vents on the two sides with aluminum alloy chassis to accelerate heat dissipation, and prolong the life of the video capture card. The ORICO HVC-1080 comes with a 1-year warranty.

values.value: USB-A 3.0 x1 (PC Connection), HDMI x1 (1080P @60Hz Video Input), Audio x2 (Dual Audio Input)
